name: voice-qa-app
description: Voice-Driven Q&A Application with React and FastAPI

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: cd backend && pytest && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && black . && isort . && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Voice Q&A Team
